properties.areaDesc: Croatan and Roanoke Sounds; Alligator River; Albemarle Sound
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 3:06PM EST until January 5 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...STRONG WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS CONTINUE THROUGH SUNDAY...
...LOW WATER CONDITIONS SUNDAY MORNING ON TIDAL RIVERS...

.A cold front will cross the region this evening with strong west
to northwest winds developing behind the front and building seas
offshore. These strong winds overnight will push water to the
eastern side of the Pamlico Sound, creating low water conditions
along the tidal rivers west of the Pamlico Sound Sunday morning.
Conditions improve through the day Sunday and Sunday night.

* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
very rough waters expected.

* WHERE...Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds and the
Alligator River.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
